ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Steamfont
ygData.msgSnippet: Hahaha!  My favorite memory is before they lowered Meldrath s level... At level 14, I convinced my friend Destructor that the minos would be good xp and we ran
ygData.messageBody:
Hahaha! My favorite memory is before they lowered Meldrath's level...
At level 14, I convinced my friend Destructor that the minos would be good
xp and we ran straight to the back of the cave and Meldrath casted through
the wall and killed us in like 1 cast. We tried unsuccessfully to get our
corpses back, suffering numerous deaths and Destructor was ready to KILL
me.

Then we see this dark elf, in full rubicite (now this is back in say June of
last year). I did a /who and it was a shaman! I remember being SOOOO
confused how a dark elf could be a shaman and so in awe of his rubicite.
Well he buffed us up good with Tuna and such. I remember Destructor taking
screenshots because his HPs went over 1000!!! Needless to say we got our
corpses but I still harbor a secret hatred for Meldrath and kill him every
chance I get.

Halana, 2 pixels from 55 shaman, freshly spanked by Trakanon
Tani, 27th Bardette, stuck in Butcherblock
Solusek Ro :)


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Big Daddy Legba [mailto:legba@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, August 15, 2000 9:24 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Steamfont
>
>
> If you see the minotaur hero, don't expect the guards to stop
> him, he eats
> them for breakfast. However I think he is camped alot these
> days, so not a
> threat. Back in my heydey of Steamfont he would run rampant
> through the
> zone, slaughtering newbies till about 5 guards would gang up
> and take him
> down...
>
